text: You know kid, you put up a pretty decent fight for a human.
speaker: queen

text: It's kind of a shame you have to die this way.
speaker: queen

text: ...I don't want to be a warrior anymore...
speaker: zatt_despair

text: You're pretty strange yourself, you know. Why would you hold a child that way?
speaker: protag_neutral

text: I'm actually kind of curious if this will work or not.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Like, you command all the Lunarbeasts, right? Will the Satellite Laser affect you? The positron inflection matches up.
speaker: protag_happy

text: The beam doesn't hurt people, but you should emit a quantum lunar substate.
speaker: protag_happy

text: Hmm, maybe I should try realigning the diatonic tachyon meter before firing--
speaker: protag_annoyed

text: Oh geez, pease shut up the hell up.
speaker: queen

text: How can someone not be? It's so cool!
speaker: protag_happy

text: Don't think this is over kid...
speaker: queen
